thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Kean O'Hara
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Kean O'Hara

author: Kean O'Hara
title: Kean O'Hara
text:
My son & I went into the Sligo store to see about getting a pair of runners he had seen online. Didn't have his size so the store attendant gave us the option of ordering in store & having them delivered to the store or to our home.
This was at 4.30pm on Saturday, they were delivered by 10am on Monday. Exceptional service & we were kept informed all the while by e mail & text.
Even better there was 50 euro off the shoes, best price we could find online by a mile!
